mapper.update: update order_ set status='delete',gmtModified=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select o.id 'oid',o.orderCode 'orderCode',o.address 'address',o.post 'post',o.receiver 'receiver',o.status 'status', o.mobile 'mobile',o.userMessage 'userMessage',o.createDate 'ocreateDate',o.payDate 'payDate',o.deliveryDate 'deliveryDate', o.confirmDate 'confirmDate',o.gmtModified 'gmtModified',u.id 'uid',u.name 'username',u.password 'password' from order_ o left join `user` u on o.uid = u.id where o.id = #{id} and status != 'delete'
